divs: Sighting DetailsLooking at the constellation Orion when four or five faint balls of light crossed the sky heading southwest in seconds at what appeared to be extremly high altitude and one of the lights seemed to move around the others as they moved accross the sky. they faded out of view extremly fast. I noticed jet planes in the sky at the same time and as a watcher for this for many years i know these were not any known aircraft, i have seen two other ufo's in my lifetime but only shared it with close friends only to be laughed at so finally watching the sky at night when I go out to smoke has proved that something is flying around up there, ours or thiers?
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around January 5th 2011
Summary: four or five faint balls of light crossed the sky in seconds,
